data.name: EditorDesc_Laser_Align
data.value: The laser has been turned ON with low power and a 50% duty cycle. Look at the image of the patch cord while you adjust the XY-translator on the system until the laser is aligned to the desired fiber of the patch cord. Once laser alignment is complete, click the "Stop Aligning Laser" button.
data.comment: Describes how to use the Laser Calibration Editor in Alignment Mode.

data.name: EditorDesc_Laser_Base
data.value:
To enable Opto Stim, insert the laser key into the stub wall of the system, and turn clockwise. Then select the desired wavelength from the drop down menu and connect the white ribbon cable inside the system to the corresponding laser.
For 635 nm only: Click “Align Laser”, and adjust the XY translator inside the FP3002 system to align the laser to the desired patch cord branch.
For 450 nm only: Attach a secondary patch cord (mono branch or bifurcating) to the secondary FC connector on the stub wall of the system.
For both lasers: Click “Measure Power” and use an external power meter to set laser power. Then configure all other stimulation parameters
data.comment: Describes how to use the Laser Calibration Editor in Base Mode.

data.name: EditorDesc_Laser_Meas
data.value: The laser has been turned ON in constant mode. Adjust the "Amplitude" property and measure the power of the laser coming out of the patch cord. If the "Amplitude" property is increased above 50%, then the laser will alternate between 30 seconds ON and 5 seconds OFF. Once power calibration is complete, click the "Stop Measuring Power" button.
data.comment: Describes how to use the Laser Calibration Editor in Measure Power Mode.

data.name: EditorDesc_LEDs
data.value: Adjust the LED Power percentage while measuring the power output from the end of the fiber. Once the desired power is found for a given LED, click "Accept" to store the value into settings.
data.comment: Describes how to use the LED Calibration Editor to Measure LED Power.

data.name: EditorDesc_Misc
data.value:
Digital IOs- Use drop down menus to configure how the system will send and receive TTL pulses. Note: Digital Output 1 is associated with the function of the internal laser.
Screen Brightness- Use slider to change LCD screen brightness.
Clock Configuration- Use drop down menu to select the master clock to use for photometry data. The system will default to the internal clock. If using an external device as the master clock, set clock configuration to ‘External Device’.

data.name: EditorDesc_ROIs
data.value: Increase the 470 nm LED to make the patch cord visible in the image. Adjust the 1-Axis Translator on the FP3002 system to focus onto the attached patch cord. Once focused, draw regions of interest onto the fibers in the image that you wish to record from. The image is split such that the left portion of the image is the Red channel while the right portion is the Green channel.
data.comment: Describes how to use the Region Calibration Editor to Align the Patch Cord and Draw Regions.

data.name: EditorDesc_TrigSeq
data.value: Set the order of the LEDs in a given trigger sequence. Their associated "Frame Flag" values will appear next to the LED names.
data.comment: Describes how to use the Trigger Sequence Editor to create a trigger sequence.

data.name: Logo
data.value: ..\Resources\Logo.png;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: MsgBox_Error_CouldNotReconnect
data.value: Could not reconnect the FP3002 system. Please reopen the FP3002 Setup window.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_HarpVersion
data.value: Unsupported Bonsai.Harp version detected. Please uninstall the "Neurophotometrics.Design" and "Neurophotometrics" packages and reinstall them. This will ensure the correct version of Bonsai.Harp is installed.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_InvalidDeviceID
data.value: The device ID does not match a valid FP3002 system. Please check if the specified serial port is correct and try again.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_MultipleCameras
data.value: Unable to assign camera to FP3002 system. Please try again with only one FP3002 system connected to the computer and without any other imaging devices connected. Once the camera is assigned to the FP3002 system, you can reconnect other imaging devices.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_OutdatedFW
data.value: The firmware on the device is newer than the current driver firmware. Please update the Bonsai package or contact support for assistance.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_SerialNumNotFound
data.value: Cannot connect to FP3001 System. Please ensure that the system is connected and turned on. Also, please verify that the "Serial Number" property is specified.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_TimeoutFindSystem
data.value: Cannot find the FP3002 system. Please verify that the system is ON and connected and try again.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_UnsupportedFWVersion
data.value: The firmware on the device is unsupported by the current driver. Please update the firmware version on the device or contact support for assistance.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_UnsupportedHWVersion
data.value: The hardware version of this FP3002 system is incompatible with the current driver. Please contact support for assistance.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_UpdateDriverVersion
data.value: The firmware on the device is newer than the current driver firmware. Please update the Bonsai package or contact support for assistance.

data.name: MsgBox_Error_WorkflowRunning
data.value: The FP3001 system cannot be calibrated while the workflow is running. Please stop the workflow and try again.

data.name: MsgBox_MethodsText
data.value: For Fiber Photometry experiments, we used Neurophotometrics LLC's FP3002 Fiber Photometry system. We recorded from {0} red channel regions of interest and {1} green channel regions of interest using {2} light at powers of {3}, with an effective frame rate of {4}Hz.

data.name: MsgBox_MethodsTextOpto
data.value: Opto-Stimulation was conducted with {0} light at a power of {1}. We used {2} pulse trains {3} with a pulse frequency of {4}Hz and pulse width of {5}ms.

data.name: MsgBox_Question_EnableOpto
data.value:
Warning: Class 3b lasers
Please wear appropriate eye protection and do not look into the laser.

data.name: MsgBox_Question_ResetPersistentRegisters
data.value: This will reset the device to its default factory settings. Do you want to continue?

data.name: MsgBox_Question_SavePersistentRegisters
data.value: Do you want to save the register values on persistent device memory?

data.name: MsgBox_Question_SecondaryPatchCord
data.value: Have you attached your second patch cord?

data.name: MsgBox_Question_UpdateDeviceFW
data.value: The firmware on the device is older than the current driver firmware. Do you want to update the firmware on the device? (recommended)

data.name: MsgBox_Question_WriteToPersistentRegisters
data.value: Do you wish to write settings to the FP3002 system's persistent registers? This will cause the FP3002 system to possess these settings even after power cycling.

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_CouldNotReconnectSystem
data.value: Could not reconnect to the FP3002 system. Please close the editor and reopen it. If the issue persists, please disconnect the system, power cycle it, reconnect it, and try again.

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_InvalidPropertyValue
data.value: Cannot Process Value = "{0}". Please Verify The Value And Retry.

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_LaserSafety
data.value: WARNING: To protect the user and the system's internal laser, the duration of laser stimulation will be set to 30 seconds when the amplitude is above 50% and the duty cycle is above 75%. Do you want to proceed?

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_NoLaserWavelengthSpecified
data.value: Cannot start Opto-Stimulation without the Laser Wavelength specified. Please specify and Laser Wavelength and try again.

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_SerialNumberMismatch
data.value: The configuration file does not match the device serial number. Do you want to proceed?

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_StimKeySwitchOff
data.value: Cannot start Opto-Stimulation with the Key-lock Switch in the OFF position. Please turn the Key-lock Switch to the ON position and try again.

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_UpdateCameraSerialNumber
data.value: There is no registered imaging sensor in the camera firmware. Please disconnect all other imaging devices from the computer to allow registration.

data.name: MsgBox_Warning_VerifyDeviceConnected
data.value: Cannot find the FP3002 system. Please verify that the system is ON and connected. Click "Retry" once verified or click "Cancel" to exit.

data.name: Neurophotometrics
data.value: ..\Resources\Neurophotometrics.bmp;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a
